src:
Daleč od idealne podobe
04 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Rok Maver

Turobno jesensko vreme, turobno vzdušje na tribunah in prav takšna predstava na igrišču so obeležili dvoboj Tabora in Rudarja. Velenjčani so zadeli iz svoje edine priložnosti in bili blizu prvi zmage v sezoni, a so se Sežanci v sodnikovem dodatku le izvlekli z remijem.



Predrag Sikimić (v ospredju) je iz najstrožje kazni zadel za izenačenje.  Foto: Matej Glavina

SEŽANA > Tabor je včeraj krepko plesal po robu in bil blizu drugemu porazu v sezoni na domačem igrišču. Podoba moštva je bila povsem drugačna od razigrane ekipe, ki je pred dvema tednoma na istem igrišču zrušila Maribor in se prejšnji teden do zadnjega sonikovega žvižga upirala Triglavu v Kranju. Trener Almir Sulejmanović je imel pred tekmo nekaj dvomov. “Težko se je bilo pripraviti na tekmo. Ni bilo jasno, ali bo res močno deževalo in kakšno bo igrišče, prav tako je bila do neke mere nepredvidljiva postavitev Rudarja,” je pojasnil Sulejmanović. Vreme se je sicer usmililo, saj je spet začelo obilno deževati šele po tekmi.
Gostje so se odločili za popoln umik na obrambne okope. Novi trener Andrej Panadić (v zapisniku je bil naveden kot predstavnik ekipe) je Velenjčane prvič vodil v sredo na pokalni tekmi z Nafto, vendar se je po neuspelem eksperimentu odločil v Sežani poskušati s povsem obrambnim pristopom. Postavil je igro s petimi igralci v obrambi, štirimi vezisti in osamljenim napadalcem Borno Petrovićem. Taktika bi se mu ob slabem dnevu Sežancev skoraj obrestovala, saj je njegova ekipa imela vse do druge minute sodnikovega dodatka v žepu prvo zmago v prvenstvu.

CB Tabor Sežana : Rudar 1:1 (0:0)

Stadion Rajka Štolfe, gledalcev 400 sodnik Kajtazović (Kranj) 7. Strelca - 0:1 Radić (65), 1:1 Sikimić (92, z 11m). Cherrybox Tabor Sežana: Adam-, Ristić 5,5, Horvat 5, Nemanič 5,5, Azinović 6, S. Babić 5 (od 64. M. Babić 5,5), Krivičić 6, Sever 5,5, Mihaljević 5,5 (od 78. Stančič-), Bongongui 6 (od 69. Milošev 5), Sikimić 6. Trener: Almir Sulejmanović. Rudar: Stopajnik 6,5, Ćosić 5, Džinić 6, Filipović 5,5, Krefl 5,5, Hrubik 5,5, Vošnjak 5 (od 31. Kitek 5,5), Črnčič 5,5, Kuzmanović 5,5, Radić 6 (od 90. Kadrić-), Petrović 5,5 (od 70. Pušaver 5,5). Rumeni kartoni: Radić, Džinić, Črnčič, Stopajnik, Kadrić; rdeč karton: Ćosić (68, grob prekršek).

Prvi polčas je ponudil slabo predstavo, na igrišču pa so vendarle prevladovali Sežanci. Njihova premoč pa je bila jalova, saj niso vedeli, kako razbiti bunker gostov. Zelo malo so igrali po bokih, veliko so gestikulirali, pri čemer je znova prednjačil Predrag Sikimić, ki je v nemoči uspel poslati žogo tudi na bližnje parkirišče. Srbski napadalec je imel v 38. minuti najlepšo priložnost za zadetek, a je njegov strel mimo dveh obrambnih igralcev vratar Tomaž Stopajnik lepo obranil. Spet je s hitrimi prodori nemir v nasprotnikove vrste vnašal hitri Rodrigue Bongongui, nekaj časa pa je bil nevaren Dominik Mihaljević, ki pa je nato padel v sivino.
Tudi uvod v drugi polčas ni ponudil spremembe razmerij moči na igrišču. Potem pa se je znova uresničilo klasično nenapisano nogometno pravilo in Rudar je s prvim strelom v okvir vrat povedel. V 65. minuti je Ivor Horvat žogo izbil le do Dominika Radića, ki je nato zadel s sredine kazenskega prostora. Le malo zatem je Marko Ćosić na sredini igrišča z dvignjenim podplatom grobo zrušil Bongonguija, ki je nato moral z igrišča, a kaže, da ni utrpel poškodbe. Sodnik Nejc Kajtazović je Ćosiću pokazal pot v slačilnico. Taborjani so imeli zatem dva prosta strela z roba kazenskega prostora, ki pa so ju slabo izvedli. Najbliže golu je bil v sklepnem jurišu proti vratom knapov Marko Ristić v 88. minuti, ko se je po močnem strelu z leve strani še dolgo tresla leva vratnica.
Rudar prekinil nizRudar je prekinil niz treh porazov, a je kar 16 tekem brez zmage. V tem pogledu je rekorder v prvi ligi Jadran iz Dekanov, ki je bil leta 1995 brez zmage 30 tekem. Potrošnik Beltinci leta 2000 ni zmagal 20 tekem, Kalcer Radomlje pa je bil leta 2017 brez zmage 18 tekem.
Že v sodniškem dodatku se je domačim nasmehnila sreča. David Hrubik je pred svojimi vrati po strelu Dina Stančiča igral z roko, najstrožjo kazen pa je unovčil Sikimić, z enajstim golom sezone. Slednji je poskusil tudi v četrti minuti dodatka, a je bil spet na mestu velenjski vratar. “Vesel sem, da smo vztrajali do 90. minute, če bi zadnji udarec Sikimića končal v mreži bi lahko celo zmagali. Z osvojeno točko smo tekmeca kljub vsemu zadržali na znatnem zaostanku. Prvi polčas smo bili boljši, si ustvarili nekaj priložnosti, vendar nas je naivno izbijanje žoge drago stalo. Ob našem pritisku so imeli Velenjčani odprto avtocesto do našega gola in so nekajkrat poskušali s protinapadi doseči še en zadetek,” je povedal Sulejmanović.
V velenjskem taboru so bili kajpak razočarani. “Odigrali smo izredno tekmo, držali smo se vseh dogovorov, taktično čvrsto in zrelo, ustavili smo kombinatorno igro, ki jo doma ponavadi igra tekmec. Potem smo izgubili igralca, a se kljub temu dobro držali. Zmago smo izgubili po enajstmetrovki in seveda ne moremo biti zadovoljni,” je dejal Panadić.


Domači nogometaši (v belih dresih) so imeli več od igre, rezultata pa ne. Foto: Matej Glavina
text:
Far from ideal
04 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Rock Maver

The bleak autumn weather, the bleak atmosphere in the stands and just such a play on the pitch marked the duel of Tabor and Rudar. The men of Velenje scored from their only opportunity and were close to their first win of the season, but the Sežans only pulled away with a draw.



Predrag Sikimić (in the foreground) hit the toughest penalty to equalize. Photo: Matej Glavina

SEZANA> Yesterday the camp boldly danced around the edge and was close to a second home defeat of the season. The image of the team was completely different from the playful team that collapsed Maribor on the same pitch two weeks ago and resisted Triglav in Kranj last week until the last sonic whistle. Coach Almir Sulejmanovic had some doubts before the game. “It was hard to prepare for the match. It wasn't clear if it was going to rain really bad and what the pitch would be like, it was also unpredictable to set up Rudar, ”explained Sulejmanovic. The weather had compassion, as it started to rain again only after the race.
The guests opted for a complete retreat to the defense trenches. The new coach Andrej Panadić (listed as a team representative on the scoresheet) led the Velenje team for the first time on Wednesday in a cup match with Nafta, but after a failed experiment, he decided to try a completely defensive approach in Sežana. He pitched a game with five players on defense, four midfielders and a lone hitter, Borno Petrovic. Tactics would almost pay off for him on the bad day of the Sežance, as his team had the first victory in the championship until the second minute of the referee's pocket.

CB Tabor Sežana: Rudar 1: 1 (0: 0)

Rajka Stolfe Stadium, spectators 400 Judge Kajtazović (Kranj) 7th Sagittarius - 0: 1 Radic (65), 1: 1 Sikimić (92, with 11m). Cherrybox Tabor Sežana: Adam-, Ristic 5,5, Horvat 5, Nemanic 5,5, Azinovic 6, S. Babic 5 (from 64. M. Babic 5,5), Krivicic 6, North 5,5, Mihaljevic 5, 5 (from 78. Stancic-), Bongongui 6 (from 69. Milosev 5), Sikimić 6. Coach: Almir Sulejmanovic. Miner: Stopajnik 6.5, Cosic 5, Dzinic 6, Filipovic 5.5, Krefl 5.5, Hrubik 5.5, Vosnjak 5 (from 31. Kitek 5.5), Crncic 5.5, Kuzmanovic 5.5, Radic 6 (from 90. Kadric-), Petrovic 5.5 (from 70. Pushaver 5.5). Yellow cards: Radic, Dzinic, Crncic, Stopajnik, Kadric; red card: Cosic (68, rough offense).

The first half offered a poor performance, but the pitch was still dominated by the Sežans. Their superiority, however, was futile, as they did not know how to break the bunker of guests. They played very little in the flanks, gesticulated a lot, with Predrag Sikimić leading the way, who managed to send the ball into the nearby parking lot in helplessness. The Serbian striker had the best opportunity to score after 38 minutes, but his shot was saved by keeper Tomaž Stopajnik. Again, with a speedy breakthrough in the opponent's line, a speedy Rodrigue Bongongui was introduced, and for a while Dominic Mihaljevic was dangerous, but then fell into the gray.
Also, the introduction to the second half offered no change in power ratios on the pitch. Then again, the classic unwritten football rule came to fruition and Rudar took the first shot into the door frame. In the 65th minute Ivor Horvat cleared the ball only to Dominic Radic, who then struck from the middle of the penalty area. Shortly thereafter, Marko Cosic crunched Bongongui in the middle of the court with his soles lifted, which he then had to leave from the court, but showed that he had not suffered an injury. Judge Nejc Kajtazovic showed Cosic the way to the locker room. The campers then had two free-kicks from the edge of the penalty area, but poorly executed. The closest goal was to Marko Ristić as he finished off a strike from the left after 88 minutes, after a long shot coming in from the left.
Miner breaks downRudar breaks three defeats but has 16 straight games without a win. In this respect, the record holder in the first league is the Adriatic from the Decans, which in 1995 was unbeaten in 30 games. Consumer Beltinci did not win 20 matches in 2000, and Kalcer Radomlje won 18 matches in 2017 without winning.
Even in the judge's appendix, the locals smiled with happiness. David Hrubik played his hand at the door after a shot from Dino Stancic, but Sikimić had the toughest penalty on the eleventh goal of the season. The latter also tried in the fourth minute of the extra, but was again in place by the Velenje goalkeeper. “I am glad that we persisted until the 90th minute, if Sikimić's last shot in the net could even be won. With the winning point, we nevertheless kept the competitor behind a considerable lag. We were better in the first half, we created some opportunities, but the naive breaking of the ball cost us dearly. With our pressure, the people of Velenje had an open highway to our goal and tried to counter-attack several times, ”said Sulejmanovic.
They were disappointed in the Velenje camp. “We played an extraordinary game, we kept to all agreements, tactically firm and mature, we stopped the combinatorial game, which is usually played by a competitor at home. Then we lost the player, but still held up well. We lost by eleven meters and of course we cannot be satisfied, ”said Panadic.


The home footballers (in white jerseys) had more than the game but the result did not. Photo: Matej Glavina
